name: Magical Garden
description:
Welcome in your're Garden,

Plant everything you need to make the ultimate garden but be careful, tree are alive and may interact in an unexpected way.

Disclaimer: If you play the WebGL version, please play in fullscreen otherwise, the UI may not scale properly.

Ps: tiles and tree are downloaded on the internet, we didn’t make all the arts. (Download link for artworks: https://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-grassland-tileset https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-plant-repack )
